conversations.content: Load my work from last Friday afternoon.

tool_call: memoryManager_listSessions
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731398400000_a1b2c3d4e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731398400000_f5g6h7i8j", "sessionDescription": "Finding last Friday's session", "sessionMemory": [], "toolContext": {"currentPath": "/home/user/Projects", "openFiles": [], "recentCommands": []}, "primaryGoal": "Load Friday afternoon work", "subgoal": "Find Friday sessions"}, "limit": 20, "order": "desc"}
Remove the 'Future Considerations' section from my proposal document - we decided not to include it.

tool_call: contentManager_deleteContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731102012345_p2q1r0s9t", "workspaceId": "ws_1731102012345_u8v7w6x5y", "sessionDescription": "Removing future considerations section", "sessionMemory": "Team decided to focus proposal on immediate scope only.", "toolContext": "Deleting out-of-scope future considerations", "primaryGoal": "Remove future considerations", "subgoal": "Delete section from Docs/proposal.md"}, "filePath": "Docs/proposal.md", "content": "## Future Considerations

While not part of the immediate scope, the following items may be explored in subsequent phases:

- Integration with third-party analytics platforms
- Mobile application development
- Advanced machine learning features
- International market expansion"}
Find places where we're making multiple API calls that could be batched into a single request.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731523100000_i9j0k1l2m", "workspaceId": "ws_1731523100000_n3o4p5q6r", "sessionDescription": "Finding redundant API calls", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User wants to batch API requests", "primaryGoal": "Find API calls that can be batched", "subgoal": "Search for multiple fetch/axios calls"}, "query": "fetch axios.get api.get Promise.all", "limit": 20, "includeContent": true}
List the latest evening-pages states, load the rooftop one, and note it.

tool_call: memoryManager_listStates
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731076760789_s7m2v9c4n", "workspaceId": "ws_1731055200789_p4m7x1c9v", "sessionDescription": "Review evening states", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "List evening states", "primaryGoal": "Fetch evening-pages states", "subgoal": "Limit two"}, "tags": ["evening-pages"], "limit": 2, "order": "desc"}
Reorganize my client folders - move the Marketing folder to Clients/Acme-Corp.

tool_call: vaultManager_moveFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731067634300_j3k4l5m6n", "workspaceId": "ws_1731067634300_o7p8q9r0s", "sessionDescription": "Reorganizing client folder structure", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User consolidating client materials", "primaryGoal": "Move Marketing to Clients/Acme-Corp", "subgoal": "Relocate Marketing folder"}, "path": "Marketing", "newPath": "Clients/Acme-Corp/Marketing"}
Result: {"success": true, "data": {"results": [{"traceId": "trace_1731089400111", "timestamp": 1731089400111, "content": "Afterglow drift settled at 68Hz shimmer."}]}}
Result: {"success": true, "data": {"response": "- Sunrise trust holds when alert lag stays under 420ms.\n- Use the trust pulse before analyzing Quazarine drift.", "agentUsed": "Nixora Driftwriter"}}
Result: {"success": true, "path": "Archive-2024/Meetings", "message": "Folder created successfully"}

tool_call: vaultManager_createFolder
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731031111234_g4h5i6j7k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731031111234_l8m9n0o1p", "sessionDescription": "Annual archive organization", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Setting up 2024 archive structure", "primaryGoal": "Archive all 2024 content", "subgoal": "Create Notes subfolder"}, "path": "Archive-2024/Notes"}
Find all markdown files in my vault that have 'TODO' in them and show me where they are.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchDirectory
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731031818901_y4z5a6b7c", "workspaceId": "ws_1731031818901_d8e9f0g1h", "sessionDescription": "TODO tracking session", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Finding all files containing TODO items", "primaryGoal": "Locate TODO items across vault", "subgoal": "Search for TODO keyword"}, "query": "TODO", "paths": ["."], "searchType": "files", "includeContent": true}
Result: {"success": true, "data": {"filePath": "Workspaces/Lighthouse/Notes/Wick.md", "appendedLength": 133}}

tool_call: memoryManager_createState
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731111100123_7e80ff2c5", "workspaceId": "ws_1731110600456_4df4d7c61", "sessionDescription": "Lighthouse wick trimming", "sessionMemory": "Wick log updated", "toolContext": "Save state", "primaryGoal": "Capture wick trimming handoff", "subgoal": "Tag for morning crew"}, "name": "state_lighthouse_wick_11_08", "description": "Wick trimming logged for 2025-11-08", "targetSessionId": "session_1731111100123_7e80ff2c5", "includeSummary": true, "tags": ["lighthouse", "wick"]}
Find and replace all http://example.com links with https://example.com in the documentation

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731034646464_u7v8w9x0y", "workspaceId": "ws_1731034646464_m9n0p1q2r", "sessionDescription": "Link migration", "sessionMemory": "User fixing broken HTTP links by updating them to HTTPS after site migration", "toolContext": "vaultLibrarian: User searching documentation for old HTTP links that need HTTPS update", "primaryGoal": "Fix broken links", "subgoal": "Find files with http://example.com links"}, "query": "http://example.com", "paths": ["docs"]}
Result: {"success": true, "content": "# ML Trends\n\nKey topics: Neural networks, LLMs, edge computing"}

tool_call: memoryManager_updateSession
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1730000000024_xyz456hij", "workspaceId": "ws_1730000000024_abc789klm", "sessionDescription": "Blog content review", "sessionMemory": "User reviewing blog content. Read ML trends post covering neural networks, LLMs, edge computing.", "toolContext": "Updating session with blog topic", "primaryGoal": "Review and track blog topics", "subgoal": "Update session metadata"}, "name": "Blog Review - ML Trends", "description": "Reviewed machine learning trends: neural networks, LLMs, edge computing"}
Result: {"success": true, "results": [{"path": "Projects/Status-Report.md", "score": 0.96}]}

tool_call: contentManager_readContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1730000000008_hij890mno", "workspaceId": "ws_1730000000008_klm123pqr", "sessionDescription": "Project file review", "sessionMemory": "User reviewing project files. Found status report with high relevance.", "toolContext": "Reading status report", "primaryGoal": "Review and checkpoint project work", "subgoal": "Read project status"}, "filePath": "Projects/Status-Report.md"}
I need to search for content across multiple topics in my knowledge base - look for notes about 'machine learning', 'neural networks', and 'deep learning'. Run them all at once.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_batch
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731027000000_a1b2c3d4e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731027000000_f5g6h7i8j", "sessionDescription": "Batch searching AI/ML topics", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User wants parallel search across multiple ML-related topics", "primaryGoal": "Search for machine learning, neural networks, and deep learning content", "subgoal": "Execute batch search for all three queries"}, "searches": [{"query": "machine learning", "limit": 5, "includeContent": true, "snippetLength": 150}, {"query": "neural networks", "limit": 5, "includeContent": true, "snippetLength": 150}, {"query": "deep learning", "limit": 5, "includeContent": true, "snippetLength": 150}], "mergeResults": false, "maxConcurrency": 3}
Update all my meeting notes to replace 'Action Item:' with 'TODO:' for consistency.

tool_call: contentManager_findReplaceContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731032424567_g5h6i7j8k", "workspaceId": "ws_1731032424567_l9m0n1o2p", "sessionDescription": "Meeting notes standardization", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Replacing action item labels across meeting notes", "primaryGoal": "Standardize meeting note format", "subgoal": "Replace action item syntax"}, "findText": "Action Item:", "replaceText": "TODO:", "filePath": "Meetings/Team-Standup-2025-01-15.md", "caseSensitive": true, "wholeWord": false}
Generate 3 different hero images for my landing page about sustainable energy. Make them modern and professional.

tool_call: agentManager_generateImage
arguments: {
  "context": {
    "sessionId": "session_1762640201371_jqmsr6l9g",
    "workspaceId": "ws_1762640201371_5x2grctet",
    "sessionDescription": "Image generation request",
    "sessionMemory": "",
    "toolContext": "User needs AI-generated image",
    "primaryGoal": "Generate image",
    "subgoal": "Create image with specified prompt"
  },
  "prompt": "Modern professional hero image for sustainable energy website. Solar panels on contemporary building rooftop at golden hour, wind turbines in background, clean geometric composition, vibrant blue sky, sharp professional photography style, inspiring and optimistic mood, 8k quality",
  "provider": "google",
  "model": "imagen-4",
  "savePath": "landing-page/hero-solar.png",
  "aspectRatio": "16:9",
  "numberOfImages": 1
}
Find and replace 'alpha' with 'beta' but only match whole words.

tool_call: contentManager_findReplaceContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731104456789_v4w3x2y1z", "workspaceId": "ws_1731104456789_a0b9c8d7e", "sessionDescription": "Replacing alpha with beta", "sessionMemory": "User wants to update version references.", "toolContext": "Finding and replacing whole word matches only", "primaryGoal": "Replace alpha version references", "subgoal": "Update in changelog.md"}, "filePath": "CHANGELOG.md", "findText": "alpha", "replaceText": "beta", "wholeWord": true, "caseSensitive": false}
Result: {"success": true, "workspaceId": "ws_1731004454321_h7m9p2q5t", "fieldPath": "status", "newValue": "audit-review"}

tool_call: contentManager_appendContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731101460789_q7m2v9c4s", "workspaceId": "ws_1731004454321_h7m9p2q5t", "sessionDescription": "Log audit-review", "sessionMemory": "Status now audit-review", "toolContext": "Append log", "primaryGoal": "Update Ops/Logs/Workspace.md", "subgoal": "Add entry"}, "filePath": "Ops/Logs/Workspace.md", "content": "\n- Status switched to audit-review for QA sweep (23:10).\n"}
Show me all the saved snapshots I've created so I can pick one to restore.

tool_call: memoryManager_listStates
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731018200000_a1b2c3d4e", "workspaceId": "ws_1731018200000_f5g6h7i8j", "sessionDescription": "Listing saved state snapshots", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User wants to view all saved snapshots", "primaryGoal": "List all state snapshots", "subgoal": "Display available states"}, "limit": 20, "order": "desc"}

Result: {"success": true, "data": {"response": "1. Western ridge sensors spiked; throttle uplink to 60%.\n2. Midwater beacons desynced; rerun sync script before midnight.\n3. South span wind shear rising; prep alternate route.", "agentUsed": "Nixora Driftwriter"}}

Agent returned the three beats—updating the summary file so it only shows the new list.

tool_call: contentManager_findReplaceContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731108600123_8fde01abe", "workspaceId": "ws_1731108600456_d94b1a5e6", "sessionDescription": "Summarize Nixora signals", "sessionMemory": "Driftwriter output captured.", "toolContext": "Replace beats block", "primaryGoal": "Update Drift/Nixora/Summaries/Signals.md", "subgoal": "Insert agent beats"}, "filePath": "Drift/Nixora/Summaries/Signals.md", "findText": "### Beats", "replaceText": "### Beats
1. Western ridge sensors spiked; throttle uplink to 60%.
2. Midwater beacons desynced; rerun sync script before midnight.
3. South span wind shear rising; prep alternate route.
"}
Find all my weekly update files so I can compile them into a report

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731034646464_s3t4u5v6w", "workspaceId": "ws_1731034646464_x7y8z9a0b", "sessionDescription": "Find weekly updates", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User gathering update files for report", "primaryGoal": "Find updates", "subgoal": "Search files"}, "query": "weekly update"}
Find all places where we're using 'any' type in TypeScript. I want to add proper typing.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731522600000_s1t2u3v4w", "workspaceId": "ws_1731522600000_x5y6z7a8b", "sessionDescription": "Finding 'any' type usage", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User wants to improve type safety", "primaryGoal": "Find all 'any' type declarations", "subgoal": "Search for any type annotations"}, "query": ": any", "limit": 25, "includeContent": true}
Find all markdown files that contain the word 'TODO' and create a summary task list.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731027171717_v1w2x3y4z", "workspaceId": "ws_1731027171717_a5b6c7d8e", "sessionDescription": "Find TODOs", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "Searching for TODO items in markdown files.", "primaryGoal": "Create TODO summary", "subgoal": "Search for TODO"}, "query": "TODO"}
Create a state snapshot of my current session.

tool_call: memoryManager_createState
arguments: {
  "context": {
    "sessionId": "session_1731018700000_y1z2a3b4c",
    "workspaceId": "ws_1731018700000_d5e6f7g8h",
    "sessionDescription": "Creating session snapshot",
    "sessionMemory": "",
    "toolContext": "User saving work progress",
    "primaryGoal": "Create state snapshot",
    "subgoal": "Save current context"
  },
  "description": "Current session snapshot",
  "targetSessionId": "session_1731018700000_y1z2a3b4c",
  "name": "checkpoint"
}
Let me see my Japan trip planning workspace

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731007000000_j4k6m8n0p", "workspaceId": "ws_1731007000000_j1p2a3n4t", "sessionDescription": "Planning 2-week Japan trip for anniversary - Tokyo, Kyoto, Osaka", "sessionMemory": "Flights booked (LAX-NRT, April 15-29, 2026). Researched 25+ hotels, shortlisted 8. Created day-by-day draft itinerary. Budget: $8K total ($6K remaining after flights). Need JR Pass and reserve key restaurants.", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to finalize hotel bookings and reserve Michelin restaurants", "primaryGoal": "Plan perfect 2-week Japan anniversary trip within $8K budget", "subgoal": "Finalize accommodations and make restaurant reservations"}, "id": "ws_1731007000000_j1p2a3n4t"}
Result: {"success": true, "agent": {"id": "agent_5555555555", "name": "text-summarizer", "type": "text"}}
Let me continue working on my sci-fi novel manuscript workspace

tool_call: memoryManager_loadWorkspace
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731019000000_s5c7i9f1n", "workspaceId": "ws_1731019000000_s1c2i3f4n", "sessionDescription": "Writing sci-fi novel 'The Quantum Divide' - space opera with AI consciousness themes", "sessionMemory": "Chapter 15 of 30 complete (52K words total, target 90K). Main character arc planned through chapter 20. Plot twist in chapter 18 needs foreshadowing. Beta reader feedback on chapters 1-10: loved worldbuilding, wants more character depth. Writing 1500 words/day average.", "toolContext": "Loading workspace to write chapter 16 and review chapter 18 plot twist setup", "primaryGoal": "Complete first draft of 90K-word sci-fi novel by June 2026", "subgoal": "Write chapter 16 and seed foreshadowing for chapter 18 twist"}, "id": "ws_1731019000000_s1c2i3f4n"}
Batch update Fieldnotes/Trillark/Beacon.md so the status reads Cooling and add the two follow-up tasks.

tool_call: contentManager_batchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731108480789_76d4472af", "workspaceId": "ws_1731108480123_b90042daa", "sessionDescription": "Refresh Trillark beacon note", "sessionMemory": "We just logged the previous warm status earlier tonight.", "toolContext": "Replace status + append tasks", "primaryGoal": "Update Fieldnotes/Trillark/Beacon.md", "subgoal": "Apply batch ops"}, "operations": [{"type": "replace", "filePath": "Fieldnotes/Trillark/Beacon.md", "findText": "### Status
Warming", "replaceText": "### Status
Cooling"}, {"type": "append", "filePath": "Fieldnotes/Trillark/Beacon.md", "content": "
### Follow-up
1. Sample ridge beacons after midnight.
2. Send cooling trend to crew channel.
"}]}
Find all notes about 'API documentation' and add a summary to my Docs/Overview.md file.

tool_call: vaultLibrarian_searchContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731097898901_c1d2e3f4g", "workspaceId": "ws_1731097898901_h5i6j7k8l", "sessionDescription": "Compile API doc notes", "sessionMemory": "", "toolContext": "User wants to consolidate API documentation notes", "primaryGoal": "Find API docs and create summary", "subgoal": "Search for API documentation"}, "query": "API documentation", "limit": 20, "includeContent": true, "snippetLength": 150}
Result: {"success": true, "path": "Client-Proposals/Won", "created": true}
